health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mohamed Hatimy, Hon. Athman Mwamwiri, Hon. Hamisi Mwidani, Hon. Murfad Amur, Hon. Nzai, Hon. Juni or Wambua, Hon. Charles Kitula, Hon. Junior Wambua, Hon. Nyiro, Hon. Mwidani, Hon. Fadhili Mwalimu, Hon. Ahmed Nyundo
health_data_challenges: The challenges of allocating and using the budget amidst uncertainties and the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic were discussed.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: The need for careful budget planning and utilization in light of the uncertainties caused by the COVID-19 pandemic was emphasized.
health_sector_decisions: Decision to amend the budget for the services ending on June 30, 2020, was made.
health_evidence_base: Budget projections and considerations for the impact of the pandemic were used to inform decisions.
